headline: Broadridge's Q2 Earnings and Revenues Outpace Estimates, Rise Y/Y
summary: BR posts strong Q2 fiscal 2026 results as earnings and revenues beat estimates, recurring revenues climb 9%, and margins expand year over year.

headline: Broadridge (BR) Q2 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: A few examples: Tokenization continues to gain steam across capital markets, wealth, and asset management.  Digital communications are driving down the cost of interacting with shareholders and increasing investor engagement.  First, Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. delivered a strong second quarter including 8% recurring revenue growth constant currency and adjusted EPS of $1.59.

headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Broadridge Financial (BR) Q2 Earnings
summary: The headline numbers for Broadridge Financial (BR) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Broadridge raises annual profit forecast on investor communications strength
summary: Fintech firm Broadridge Financial raised its full-year earnings ​forecast and posted a higher ‌second-quarter profit on Tuesday, buoyed by strength ‌in its investor communications business. The firm, one of the largest investor communications and technology services providers in the ⁠U.S., has ‌benefited from increased corporate activity. "Our results reflect strong organic growth ‍of 7%, including strength in investor participation and elevated levels of event-driven activity," ​CEO Tim Gokey said.

headline: Broadridge (NYSE:BR) Delivers Impressive Q4 CY2025
summary: Financial technology provider Broadridge (NYSE:BR) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 7.8% year on year to $1.71 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.59 per share was 16.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Broadridge Financial (BR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +19.10% and +7.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Broadridge Financial: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y. (AP) — Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. BR) on Tuesday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $284.6 million. On a per-share basis, the Lake Success, New York-based company said it had profit of $2.42.
